messages.title: Standing Up for Real Change
messages.content: Other parties have forgotten about Lewisham West & Penge. Forgotten your concerns about social housing, congestion on roads, stealth privatisation of the NHS and Bedroom Tax - they are just not listening any more. UKIP will work hard to help people across this area, we are helping those who have long been ignored by their MP or Councillors. We believe in the people, you are the boss!

keyPolicies.policyDescription: UKIP wants a FAIRER Australian-style points-based system to decide who comes to work and settle here.
UKIP will pour £3 billion a year EXTRA into the NHS to keep it as a free public service, funded by scrapping our £55 million a day EU membership fee.
UKIP will SCRAP income tax on the minimum wage, SCRAP the bedroom tax, and SCRAP council tax on your children when you die.
Stopping our EU membership fee and clawing back the £830 million a day our foreign aid, UKIP is the ONLY PARTY with money to spend at home.

issues.economy: UKIP will SCRAP income tax on the minimum wage, SCRAP the bedroom tax, and SCRAP council tax on your children when you die.

housing.content: Other parties have forgotten about ... social housing ... they are just not listening any more. UKIP will work hard to help people across this area.

images.caption: GARY HARDING in Lewisham West & Penge Standing Up for Real Change
